buyer.official_name: Dublin and Dun Laoghaire Education and Training Board

procedure.title: Multi-Party Framework to supply School Stationary Kits (Core Class Resources) for Post Primary Pupils for Dublin and Dún Laoghaire Education and Training Board
procedure.description: The Goods comprise: 1. The supply of school stationery required by post primary pupils at DDLETB schools, 2. The packing of school stationery into year / subject appropriate packs (“Kits”) – the number of packs and contents to be agreed with each individual school when the place their order for a given academic year, and 3. The delivery of the packaged School Stationery kits to DDLETB schools across Dublin (Fingal, South Dublin County, and Dún Laoghaire Rathdown).
